line: what is optuna?

name: bot
line: Optuna is a hyperparameter optimization framework for machine learning. Optuna uses Bayesian optimization to search for the optimal hyperparameters by iteratively exploring the hyperparameter space and evaluating the performance of the model with different hyperparameters. You can use the library with various machine learning frameworks such as scikit-learn and PyTorch
